about_the_game:
In 'SameShadow,' you'll step into a world where extraordinary powers of teleportation, matter manipulation, and time-bending abilities await your awakening. As an enigmatic and formidable force against invading armies, you'll embark on a journey to unravel the mysteries shrouding your homeland.
Engage in relentless third-person hack-and-slash combat, wielding a razor-sharp sword or relying on your bare fists—it's a choice that will define your path. But here's the twist: you possess unparalleled powers of teleportation that turn the tide of battle. Blink behind enemies for surprise attacks, transform everyday objects into lethal projectiles, and execute devastating takedowns in the blink of an eye.

Your journey begins in a city gripped by turmoil, where a relentless pursuit is underway to locate 'the Shadow.' The Spanish government, complicit in the conflict orchestrated by external forces, aids in the relentless hunt for the Shadow. The people are caught in the crossfire as they're evacuated amidst chaos, and soldiers show no mercy in their search for 'the Shadow.'

As you progress, your powers will evolve through a skill tree, offering an array of skills and attacks—both ranged and close combat. Master the art of ragdolling your enemies through a variety of abilities. Manipulate matter to your advantage, and unlock a torrent of powers that will reshape the battlefield.
Yet, each stride toward mastery comes at a cost. The very teleportation abilities that empower you carry a dark secret—a relentless, debilitating force that grows stronger with every awakening. The truth behind this enigma remains concealed, revealed only with time.

In this gripping narrative, you'll be thrust into a world teetering on the brink of disaster, where shadowy forces are pitted against each other, and alliances crumble in the face of hidden agendas. Your quest for answers will be marked by challenges and revelations that will leave an indelible mark on your journey.
'SameShadow' isn't merely a game; it's an odyssey through time, power, and humanity's darkest depths. Will you harness your abilities to protect your homeland, or will you wield them to challenge the forces that seek to control it?
The shadows hold secrets that only you can unveil. Step into the darkness and become the legend in 'SameShadow,' where the story unfolds in a world gripped by chaos and intrigue.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game does contain violent acts. They mostly come in the way of Takedown Melee attacks.
It can be in the form of piercing an enemy through with a sword, stabbing an enemy multiple times with a Knife, teleporting a point/sharp weapon or tool directly into an enemy's skull, or even just breaking an enemy's neck.

There will be the optional dripping blood from wounds that will appear on most flat floor surfaces around the enemy or player taking damage. This option can easily be turned off.

The use of Tabaco is frequent but random. The enemy soldiers often take a quick smoke break on their patrols.

There are rare uses of profanity, strong language and such insinuations in the form of insults.
